mapper.insert: insert into team (uuid,name,description, lft, rht, parent_id,is_handle_childtask, import_id) values (#{uuid},#{name},#{description}, #{lft}, #{rht}, #{parentId} ,#{isHandleChildtask}, #{importId})
mapper.update: update team set rht = rht + 2 where rht >= #{value}
update team set lft = lft + 2 where lft >= #{value}
update team set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, is_handle_childtask = #{isHandleChildtask} where uuid = #{uuid}
UPDATE team set lft = lft - (#{rht} - #{lft} + 1) where lft > #{lft}
UPDATE team SET rht = rht - (#{rht} - #{lft} + 1) WHERE rht > #{rht}
